get.summary: Returns the health status of the service.
Returns the result of the patient query

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: patient ID of the patient to get

get.summary: Returns the result of the patient query
get.description: execute query on patient index based on 'id', 'name.family', 'name.given', 'studies.title', 'specimens.id', 'identifier.MR', 'identifier.JHN', 'studies.title'

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: return simpler, i.e. 'partial' result or default

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: return the page number based on size of result

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: return the quantity from the result
